ds:DataSource.ds:Query: select distinct TO_CHAR(inv.created_on, 'DD.MM.YYYY', 'nls_date_language = RUSSIAN') AS created, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO_FULL(inv.user_id1) AS mover_full, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO_FULL(inv.user_id2) AS acceptor_full, OBD_SYS.GET_DEPARTMENT_NAME(inv.user_id2) AS department, OBD_SYS.GET_USER_POSITION(inv.user_id1) AS mover_position, OBD_SYS.GET_USER_POSITION(inv.user_id2) AS acceptor_position, case addr.building_id when 3115 then 'удаленно' else 'по адресу – ' || addr.description end AS address, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO(inv.user_id1) AS mover, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO(inv.user_id2) AS acceptor from hrd.invent_process_new inv JOIN obd_sys.user_location loc ON (loc.user_id = inv.user_id2) JOIN hrd.dict_room room ON (room.room_id = loc.room_id) JOIN hrd.building addr ON (addr.building_id = room.building_id) where inv.proc_id = :0
ds:DataSource.ds:Collection: select os.id_1c_ as id, ro.naimen as name, ro.ser_number as serial, os.inv_num as inventory from hrd.invent_process_new inv join hrd.invent_full os on (inv.proc_id = os.act) join hrd.invent_os_1c ro on (trim(os.INV_NUM) =trim(ro.INVENT_NUMBER)) where inv.proc_id = :0
